title: windows: write clean.bat
body:
The file will be needed for windows gobuilder when it runs
"uploading-a-release" case.

rsc said:

"... This needs to be clean.bat on Windows. I want to delete bash on the builders.
It means we'll have to write a clean.bat, but this only happens in the
uploading-a-release case, so it is okay to submit this CL before that happens. ..."

Alex
